Anyone that is looking for a change of scenery and a great education at a affordable price!!!
Cardiac Hill....come see it for yourself!!

MOUNTIE FUN: Gym, Organizational activities, Sports events (GO MOUNTINEERS!!!),Hut Parties, Bowling, Movies, Skating ring(Troy,PA), and MOST IMPORTANT...HOMEWORK!!!! According to Mansfield University website we have: · major national music concerts (Past: Trey songz, Jay Sean, along with Shontelle and Jeremih, and etc.) · regional music concerts · lectures · films · comedy programs (Kevin Hart, Ron White and etc.) · variety shows · novelty programs · multi-media presentations · coffeehouses · theater · sports tournaments · diversity programs · DJ dance parties (Campus DJ's and DJ Diamond Kuts (2011) ) · travel programs (Bus trips) · recreational programs · educational programs · leadership development training · etc.

The food is good from time to time at the dining hall called Upper Manser. For the most part students dine at the food court called Lower Manser. Off campus dining: The Hungry Monkey (five-stars), Papa-V's pizzeria (five-stars), Wellsboro diner(five-stars), Pudgies, Chinese food, Perkins, KFC, McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Wendy's and etc. Bars off campus(MU is dry campus): Gregory's (five-stars), Changos, and etc.
I love the new dorms: Hickory and Oak!!!!
-Balance your college life with education and fun time!!!! -Never be afraid to ask for help!! -Join Organizations! -Don't be afraid to step out of your comfort zone!!

Mansfield University(MU) is a small town rural college. It may be a small town rural college but there are plenty of things to do on campus and off campus. Most important MU offers small classes, that allow students to have more interaction with their professors.
pageTitle: Mansfield University of Pennsylvania Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {193375=There are multiple places on campus where you can get food. In the Spruce dorm building, there is a bagel cafe called Einstein's. In Alumni Hall, there is a small shop called Jazzman's. The main dining halls themselves are Upper and Lower Manser. Lower Manser is more select and strict, but their food is amazing. You can have your own choice of meal no matter the day. Upper Manser, on the other hand, changes their meals from day to day, meaning that your favorite food could show up maybe once in a week or two. However, Upper Manser is an All You Can Eat Buffet - once you are in, you are allowed to eat anything and everything you please. The downfall of Upper Manser is that it has set meal times and no breakfast, meaning that it doesn't open until lunch at 11:30 and then dinner at 4:30. Lower Manser is opened from early morning to late at night all week days. All of these locations do serve coffee., 62083=For prospective students of Mansfield University my number one tip would be to buy an umbrella! The campus is absolutely beautiful in all seasons, but for those not familiar with this area of the state, the weather can become pretty obnoxious at times. To be honest, one of the main reasons why I chose Mansfield is because of how great the campus looked. But walking from building to building in the pouring rain in November is no fun without proper rain protection. In all seriousness, I also advise prospective students to be sure to take advantage of all this University has to offer! Although we may be a small school in a slightly remote area, there is so much to do to be involved with campus life. They offer classes, organizations and fairs that will help you not only with college life but also with job applications, interviews, and skills you will need to start working in your career. A lot of new students will not take advantage of these opportunities, but hearing from graduates and even upperclassmen, I have learned that it is always better to seize every opportunity the University offers. And the best part is, most of these events are absolutely free. (Sometimes they will even give you shirts, and who doesn't want a free shirt?) My final words of advice are to go to the University homepage (www.mansfield.edu) and you will find questions to practically any question you want to ask. And if you can't, there is always someone who is just a short e-mail away from answering you., 101993=Many of the music majors participate in Ugly Sweater Week on campus in December., 210063=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Food and Dining excellent choices and taste Dorm Life brand new dorms Academic Rigor tough but rewarding and you will be very prepared for next step of school or career. Tips for prospective students apply early. In three sentences smaller classes and more knowledgeable professors are a perfect reason to attend mansfield. countless clubs and events make mansfield not only a learning university, but one with a great social environment.
